description.value:
[Addictive] For 2d10 Minutes, character cannot be stunned or take fatigue. Afterwards character takes -20 to Toughness and Agility Tests for one hour, and takes one fatigue for every two they would have taken. If used more than 5 times in a week, user must make -20 Willpower Test or become addicted.

Requirements

Taking more than one dose within 24 hours forces a cumulative -20 Toughness Test. If failing, drug does nothing and further doses also do nothing for next 24 hours.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: -
